name: Odd Key
description: What is this key for? You have no idea where you got it from, but you refuse to part with it because it could come in handy some day.

name: Dirty Clothes
description: The clothes that you have been wearing for the past however long. They smell pretty bad. You should probably go take a bath and change clothes.

name: Coffee
description: Delicious magical coffee that will never go cold or spoil. However, you can't bring yourself to drink it. What if you need something warm to drink later?

name: Cool Rock
description: A cool rock you found on the ground.

name: Strange Drawing
description: This drawing is of a caucasian man in his early 30's wearing a blue fancy button-up coattail with sleeves that look like white doilies and black shiny dress shoes. The man is making a coy smile and holds a finger up to his lips as if to signify that he's supposed to be secretive. To the left of the man stands a young-looking caucasian woman wearing a silver dress and silver galoushes that have high heels. In the corner of the picture is a handwritten message that says "Yeah, baby!". You can't fathom why you have this drawing, but you feel compelled to keep it.
